name: Carl
description:
Carl, the aloof one, longed for so long to become a knight of valour.

Forever the target of bandits, Carl keeps hidden, with his trusty dagger at the ready.

If only he knew of combat...

name: Hermes
description: Once a great mercant of Annwn, Hermes still travels the land in search of health customers. Although, this inflicted world does not produce as many as it used to.

name: Bard Aldon
description: Poor Aldon, the famed bard of Avalon. There isn't much need for entertainers at the moment.

name: Beatrice
description:
Late in her years, Beatrice became a student of magic under the teaching of Merlin, the great wizard.

No one knows what became of him. Some say the forces of Balor took him captive, some say the great dragon Fafnir.

She vows to find him.

name: Dudley
description:
You don't see many dwarves anymore. Especially those as stubborn as Dudley.

He sure loves his mythril.

And his ale.

*hick*

name: Gilles
description:
Gilles, the wisest of Avalon scholars.

He believes he can reverse the falling with his research.

But does knowledge really keep one safe?

name: High Elf Dalan
description:
Dalan, brother to Sala, was once exalted in the ranks of the High Elves.

The High Elves once lived in great mountains, but the returned dragons have made sparse of them.

Sala and Dalan nurse what is left of the High Elves.

name: High Elf Sala
description:
Sala, sister to Dalan, was a great warrior of the High Elves.

The High Elves once lived in great mountains, but the returned dragons have made sparse of them.

Sala and Dalan nurse what is left of High Elves.

name: Flamewalker Pyre
description:
Pyre is quite the infamous Inferno Knight. He fights the fallen monsters alone out of immense pride.

Or maybe its because his acquaintances just can't handle his energy.

name: Frost Mage Boreal
description: Boreal is a noble mage of the Frozenguard, and her magical prowess is hard to match.

name: Legionnaire Boulder
description: Boulder maintains one of the highest ranks of the Earthen Legion. His diplomacy has prevented the Inferno Knights and the Frozenguard from laying waste to this land, perhaps far more so than the falling itself.

name: Storm Knight Gale
description:
Gale, the mighty Storm Knight, was one of the few to establish the Stormforce.

However, she oft strays from her posts.

Some say her hope is fleeting every day.

name: Cade
description:
Cade, the famed inventor of Avalon, was well renowned for the esoteric gadgets he produced.

But his inventions were of naught a use after the falling.

Perhaps he can make something new.

name: Master Nolan
description:
Nolan, the master gnome.

Few have heard his name, even fewer have seen his might.

name: Knight Artifice
description: Knights Artifice and Finesse journeyed to this land when Avalon fell to Balor. What Artifice lacks in finesse, he makes up for in cunning performances.

name: Rouge
description: The Crimson Archer, Rouge, is quite shrouded in mystery. Her loosed arrow never misses a mark. Some say she was a thief of Avalon, others say a Knight of Balor.

name: Horus
description:
From the skies, Horus has observed the aftermath of the falling for what seems like ages.

As the Arisen rise, hope is fleeting.

Can we really end this?

name: Sir Balin
description: From Avalon comes the Knight with Two Swords. After the falling, Sir Balin lost his dear brother to the dragons. He forever fights for revenge.

name: Enid of Annwn
description:
Enid followed Gwyn to this land when Balor took reign.

As a great testament to her talents, he's never noticed.

name: Knight Finesse
description:
Knights Artifice and Finesse journeyed to his land when Avalon fell to Balor.

Finesse is highly regarded as a true blademaster. Some say he carries a dozen swords at a time. Some say swords materialize in his hands, with just a thought.

name: Gwyn
description: Gwyn is the former King of Annwn. He gave the throne to return to the battlefield when Balor flourished after the falling. His swordplay may only be matched by the talented Knight Finesse.

name: Borr
description: Borr, the former king of the Nothren, still roams this land in search of mighty trinkets.
